name: Advosense
description: Developing the next generation of incontinence management, to empower clinicians to know when, where, and how best to respond to their patients' needs. Using technology, we're supporting practical, patient-centered, and responsive care.
one_liner: Developing the next generation of incontinence management, to empower clinicians to know when, where, and how best to respond to their patients' needs. Using technology, we're supporting practical, patient-centered, and responsive care.
